Manifest Echo: R30' Can use a bonus action to create a copy of self (armor class 20; 1 hit point; can move 30') that can be used to exchange places as a bonus action and to make attacks and opportunity attacks
Reclaim Potential: Can gain 2d6+2 temporary hit points when a Manifest Echo is destroyed 2 times per long rest
Savage Attacker: Can take the best of two melee damage rolls once per rd
Second Wind: Can use a bonus action to regain 1d10+20 hit points once per short rest
Shadow Martyr: Can use a reaction to have a Manifest Echo absorb an attack once per short rest
Sharpshooter: Suffers no disadvantage on attacks at long range/Ranged attacks ignore 3/4 cover/Can make a -5 attack with a ranged weapon to inflict +10 damage
Unleash Incarnation: Can make an extra attack through a Manifest Echo 2 times per long rest
